description: The new guidance applies to all travellers, regardless of whether they have symptoms of coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey arrivals 'must' self-isolate for two weeks
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey arrivals 'must' self-isolate for two weeks - BBC News
maintext: Passengers who are asymptomatic can use public transport for a journey of up to an hour to travel home if necessary, as long as they observe social distancing advice.
